title: Seattle City Council 3/2/2020
description:
Due to the civil emergency on the coronavirus, councilmembers are participating electronically. 
Agenda: Presentations - Seattle-King County Public Health & City of Seattle response; Payment of the Bills; CB 119752: relating to fair housing; Appointments to Domestic Workers Standards Board; CB 119739: relating to donation funds from non-City sources; Appointments and Reappointments to Seattle LGBTQ Commission, Seattle Park District Community Oversight Committee, Community Technology Advisory Board, Seattle Bicycle Advisory Board.
Advance to a specific part
Presentation - COVID-19 Update by Patty Hayes, Director, Seattle-King County Public Health - 7:46
Presentation - COVID-19 Update by Deputy Mayor Mike Fong and Laurel Nelson, Deputy Director Emergency Management - 41:38
Adoption of Introduction and Referral Calendar, Approval of Agenda - 1:27:42
Payment of Bills - 1:36:26
CB 119752: relating to fair housing - 1:37:53
Appointments to Domestic Workers Standards Board - 1:41:56
CB 119739: relating to donation funds from non-City sources - 1:44:52
Appointments and Reappointments to Seattle LGBTQ Commission, Seattle Park District Community Oversight Committee, Community Technology Advisory Board, Seattle Bicycle Advisory Board - 1:47:57
